case_description: Mr. Patel bought a ₹45,000 washing machine with 2-year warranty. Machine developed issues in 10th month. Company took 3 months to provide replacement part, during which Mr. Patel had to use laundry services costing ₹15,000. He is now seeking refund, reimbursement of laundry costs, and compensation for mental harassment.
legal_question: Can consumer claim reimbursement of alternative service costs when warranty repair is delayed? What constitutes reasonable time for warranty service under Consumer Protection Act, 2019?
